name: Team 19 - Purification samuraï
description: Only you can overcome the Ninja-created Roots! Roots are Ninja inventions, capable of creating poisonous gases and toxic monsters. Use your magic katana, which only you, the Samuraï, have, to cleanse these contaminated Roots. Join the fight, go to the Ninja's lair and defeat the Roots and the monsters escaping from them!
